The pod was terminated due to OutOfMemory (OOM) error. Increasing the memory limit will provide the pod with more resources to handle its tasks.
If increasing the memory limit does not resolve the issue, restarting the pod might help as it clears the current state of the pod and starts it fresh.
If the pod continues to face memory issues, adjusting environment variables such as JAVA_OPTS can help manage the memory usage of the JVM inside the pod.
